text: Do we have something to generate recursive sequence in Julia?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/55375| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
If it is not the case I will try to make a small package I guess :)

text: Hey <@U01FR2HFJ7M>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!
What do you mean by a recursive sequence?

elements.text: What do you mean by a recursive sequence?

text:
A sequence defined by recursion. So we could call it like `next!(seq)` .
I can do it easily for my use case, but maybe there is already something existing
